scripts.migrate:create: echo 'Enter description using dashes(-)' && read description && npx migrate-mongo create $description
scripts.kill: echo 'Enter port number' && read port && kill $(lsof -t -i:$port)
scripts.extract: node -p "'export const VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';'" > src/version.ts && yarn format:fix && git add . && git commit -m 'build: version update' && git push --tags
scripts.prisma:reset:local: yarn run env:copy:local && yarn prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:reset:test: yarn run env:copy:test && yarn prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:reset:qa: yarn run env:copy:qa && yarn prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:dev:local: yarn run env:copy:local && yarn prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:dev:test: yarn run env:copy:test && yarn prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:create-only:local: yarn run env:copy:local && yarn prisma migrate dev --create-only
scripts.prisma:create-only:test: yarn run env:copy:test && yarn prisma migrate dev --create-only
scripts.prisma:deploy:local: yarn run env:copy:local && yarn prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:deploy:test: yarn run env:copy:test && yarn prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:deploy:qa: yarn run env:copy:qa && yarn prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:deploy:production: yarn run env:copy:production && yarn prisma migrate deploy
